Class NIOAnswerBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.serverNIO.NIOAnswerBuffer

  • public class NIOAnswerBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulate a list of answer to be send to the client
    Author:
    Gregory Maitre & Patrick Andrade

      • get

        public java.nio.ByteBuffer get(java.nio.channels.Channel channel)
        Take the next answer to be send
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel of the socket that we want to answer
        Returns:
        the answer to be send or null if we close

      • removeAnswer

        public void removeAnswer(java.nio.channels.Channel channel)
        Remove an answer that has been send
        Parameters:

      • isEmpty

        Check if the list of answer is empty for a channel
        Parameters:
        socketChannel - the channel
        Returns:
        true if the list is empty or if it's null
